text: Jwaŵechete ajula juŵakwete umanyilisi wa m’chitabu kuti: “Une chinam’bichilile nacho nkaniliusyaausye kukwenu liso lyenu.” Basi ndema jajwachiweni (Sulaimana chindanda cha uchimwene chila) chili chitamilichiche kukwakwe jwatite: “Ayi ili mu ukoto wa Ambuje ŵangu kuti aninje yanti; ana tindogolele kapena tingane! Sano jwatatogolele nikuti akutogolela kwaalikamuchisya nsyene, nambo soni jwatakane basi (akukana kwaalikonya nsyene), chisimu Ambuje ŵangu ni Ŵakupata kwejinji (ŵangalajila chilichose), Ŵantuuka wannope.”
